ref: 4159 *girati1 ʻ drips, falls ʼ. &rcirclemacr P. girnā ʻ to fall ʼ, Ku. girṇo, N. girnu, Or. giribā, Mth. girab, Bhoj. giral, Aw. lakh. girab, H. girnā (whence OH. gernā ʻ to throw ʼ); OMarw. giraï; G. garvũ ʻ to drop ʼ (< gir˚ whence caus. geravvũ).
Marw. (Vīsaḷa) 1 sg.pres. giḷaüṁ ʻ waste away ʼ.
